config.markdown:
## MANUAL STEP NOTICE: This app needs to injects code into your website through posthog-js. You need to **opt-in** on your site to enable this behaviour.

```
posthog.init("api_key", {
  "api_host": "https://app.posthog.com",
  "opt_in_site_apps": true,
})
```

config.name: Environment ID
config.hint: Can be found in the Setup Checklist in the Formbricks Settings
